title: Game Progress Route
content:
elp investigate in order to reveal the faceless. Then, he invites you to witness as he makes history as the first Archduke of Baldur's Gate. You will get the following options to respond:

All right. I wouldn't dream of missing it. Fine. Let's get it over with. I have no interest in this sham of a ceremony. This stops now Gortash. I'm taking you out.

If you choose the second one, Karlach will give you her disapproval while Astarion gives his approval. Then, Gortash kneels before Duke Ulder Rave
